verses.name: Ephesians 6:6
verses.text: Not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;

verses.name: Ephesians 6:7
verses.text: With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:

verses.name: Ephesians 6:8
verses.text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether he be bond or free.

verses.name: Ephesians 6:9
verses.text: And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.

verses.name: Ephesians 6:10
verses.text: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
